name: Dirty Blood
description:
The Blood Of The Undead Is Dirty! Play As The Specialist Soldier And Save The World From The Undead "ZOMBIES" From Completing Your Mission!

An FPS Zombie Game, With Mission That Have 10 Steps To Do For The First Map! You Can Play Two Different Style From Surviving To Completing Your Mission With 6 Different Unique Weapons, Every 1 Minutes A Weapon Will Spawn In A Different Places In The Map.


And There A Different Type Of Monster Such As :
1- Normal Zombie
2- Black Iron (Guard)
3- Riger (Boss Fight)
4- Dodey (Boss Fight)



When Killing Zombies Or Dodey They Will Drop An Ammo That You Can Collect.

Free DLC As An Update

1-New Mini Game
2-New Map + New Weapon
3-New Mini Game
4-New Map + New Weapon + New Melee Weapon
5-New Mini Game
6-New Map + New Weapon
7-New Mini Game
8-New Map + New Weapon + New Melee Weapon
9-New "Unknown
